price: ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߥߊ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߰ ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߘߋ߲ߓߦߊ ߝߍ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ ߞߐߛߊߦߌ߲ ߣߊ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎߙߊ߫ ߡߍߙߍ߲߫ ߕߟߐ߬ߣߍ߲߬ ( ߛߓߏ ) ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
